message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I'll take a larger share this time, but it's still a fair split!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not getting any younger. Accept now or regret it later!
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share this time.
You're not budging, I won't either. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not falling for the 'final offer' trick again. I'll make you a counteroffer.
You're not getting any younger, Bob. This is my best offer. Take it or face the consequences!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Let's meet in the middle this time.
You've been playing hard to get, Bob. Now it's my turn to make the rules. Accept this or walk away!
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not intimidated. I'll make a counteroffer to take back the initiative.
I'm not playing games anymore, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
It's all or nothing now. I'm taking what I want, and you're getting what's left.
